item.title: Comment on Integrating WP Project Management plugin with Gmail Tasks by Aurovrata V.
item.dc:creator: Aurovrata V.
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/integrating-wp-project-management-plugin-with-gmail-tasks/#comment-2">Tareq</a>.
Hi Tareq, thanks for the comment. Sync back and forth would be a neat addition, however given the beta-state of the Google Task API I wonder if this is feasable that current juncture. We may to wait till google improves on their code. For starters I faced certain limitations with this work.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Tareq.

Hi Tareq, thanks for the comment. Sync back and forth would be a neat addition, however given the beta-state of the Google Task API I wonder if this is feasable that current juncture. We may to wait till google improves on their code. For starters I faced certain limitations with this work.

item.title: Comment on Integrating WP Project Management plugin with Gmail Tasks by Tareq
item.dc:creator: Tareq
item.description:
I have this one on my task list. Although haven't tried any digging of any sorts on google tasks, but should be there some API to sync those tasks back and forth. I'll dig in more.
Thanks.
item.content:encoded:
I have this one on my task list. Although haven’t tried any digging of any sorts on google tasks, but should be there some API to sync those tasks back and forth. I’ll dig in more.

Thanks.
